title: Bugged in promo's. Can't win or lose nything anymore?
body:
Hi guys,

I'm in my promo's from plat 1 to diamond 5. First i lost 2 games and then i won 2 games. but the game gave  me 3 loses and 1 win?! after that i lost 3 games and won 2 games. But i'm still stuck in my promo games? it gives me this: x-x-.-x-x . so it says i lost 4 games and won 1? so my account must be bugged in the promo games?! i dont know what to do, because it wont give me a lose and reset it so i can win lp again. is it possible from any mod to reset it back to 80 lp again so i can try to get to diamond before the new season?

hope that is enough information so someoe can help me,

many thanks

replies.body: Hey, that's strange!  Is this still an issue for you?  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look with you and see what happened.
